name: WordSalad
0:
”Alexa, ask Word Salad for a plot idea”
”Alexa, ask Word Salad for a food idea”
”Alexa, ask Word Salad for a project name”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word salad
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Word Salad can suggest all sorts of random (sometimes ridiculous) ideas.

Need a prompt to kick-start some writing? "Alexa, ask Word Salad for a plot idea."

Did your pen-and-paper adventuring party just stumble into the local tavern and order the daily special? "Alexa, ask Word Salad for a menu item."

Need to solve a problem in your sci-fi short story? "Alexa, ask Word Salad for some technobabble."

Starting a new project that needs a code name? "Alexa, ask Word Salad for a project name."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
